mapper.update:
update SF_REVOKE_PAROLE
CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATH_NAME = #{pathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACT = #{fact,jdbcType=CLOB},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=CLOB},
COURT = #{court,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCURATORATE = #{procuratorate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POLICE = #{police,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_REASON_TYPE_KEY = #{dicReasonTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_NUM = #{writNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COPY_ORG = #{copyOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_CASE_PATH = #{endCasePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_CASE_PATH_NAME = #{endCasePathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE_PATH = #{notePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE_PATH_NAME = #{notePathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DETAIL_INFO = #{detailInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_BASIS = #{legalBasis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_CHECK_TYPE_KEY = #{dicCheckTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONCRETE_FACTS = #{concreteFacts,jdbcType=CLOB},
ISSUE_TIME = #{issueTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_END_REASON_KEY = #{dicEndReasonKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_PATH = #{endPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_PATH_NAME = #{endPathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_ACCOUNT_NAME = #{endAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_ACCOUNT_ID = #{endAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PINGYI_PATH_NAME = #{pingyiPathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PINGYI_PATH = #{pingyiPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COP_ACCOUN_ID = #{copAccounId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPT_TIME = #{optTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DIC_BLANK_FLAG_KEY = #{dicBlankFlagKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_ACCOUNT_NAME = #{flagAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_ACCOUNT_ID = #{flagAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_TIME = #{flagTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FLAG_REASON_ID = #{flagReasonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_DETAIL_REASON = #{flagDetailReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_PATH = #{flagPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_PATH_NAME = #{flagPathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBMITTION_ORG_TYPE_ID = #{submittionOrgTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBMITTION_ORG = #{submittionOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_PRINTJYS=#{isPrintJYS,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_PRINTSHB=#{isPrintSHB,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DIC_SDFS_KEY= #{dicSdfsKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

IS_PRINTSHB=#{isPrintSHB,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIC_SDFS_KEY= #{dicSdfsKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

if.test: culprit!=null and culprit.name != null and culprit.name!=''

sql.if: AND exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g left join SF_CULPRIT c on g.id=c.group_id where c.id=t.CULPRIT_ID)
